definition: a person who is authorized to read publications or correspondence or to watch theatrical performances and suppress in whole or in part anything considered obscene or politically unacceptable, to subject to political, religious, or moral censorship
details:
noun
- a person who is authorized to read publications or correspondence or to watch theatrical performances and suppress in whole or in part anything considered obscene or politically unacceptable
- someone who censures or condemns
verb
- to subject to political, religious, or moral censorship
= example: to subject to political, religious, or moral censorship
- to forbid the public distribution of a movie or a newspaper
= synonyms: ban
